attributes.action: for release of ronnie biggs as he is of no harm to the public sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this goverment is happy to release dangrous crimanls into our socitey but refuse to allow a man who is no threat to anyone be released on parole.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
